text.section: The Department shall process documents on an expedited basis upon the payment of the fee provided in § 1-203(b)(8) of this subtitle.
The Department shall, to the extent practicable, process documents filed in person on an expedited basis on the same day that the documents are received.
The Department shall adopt regulations governing the processing of documents on an expedited basis, including reasonable limitations on filing documents of unusual volume or length.
The fees collected under § 1-203(b)(8) of this subtitle shall be credited to the fund established under § 1-203.3 of this subtitle.
